capture_screen_tip.message: Drag and Capture (Press Esc to Exit)

failed_to_register_hot_key_for_screen_ca.message: The shortcut for Capture Screen Region is registered by another application. Please redefine it.

shopping_assist.message: Enable shopping assistant can help you find your favorite commodity, and support Quick Markup.

extDescription.message: Capture webpage freely or open your local image, mark up with shape, text, icon and mind mapping information, one-click upload to share. Support PNG and shortcuts. Useful in organizing ideas and works, planning and tracking projects, solving the problem of image-based information exchange.

openApp.message: Open local image and mark up

save_fail.message: Sorry, failed to save the screenshot.

tooBig.message: The image is too large and will be truncated.

uploadFailed.message: Sorry, upload failed, please check the network and try again.

loading.message: The page is loading, please wait.

tip_markup1.message: Quick Markup is a free, all-purpose tool that enables you to

tip_markup2.message: mark up with shape, text, icon and mind mapping information;

tip_markup3.message: save and manage your notes, images and screenshots;

tip_markup4.message: share your data in a variety of ways;

tip_upload.message: Your screenshot will be saved on quick-markup.com, which will be automatically removed after about 30 days.

tip_copy.message: Copy screenshot to the clipboard. Then it will be placed on your clipboard for you to paste into another program.

clear_element_tip.message: Click or press DELETE key to clear an element in this webpage.

promotiontip.message: A set of awesome tools including eyedropper and ruler for web designers, frontend developers, etc.
